definition: History of the Song Dynasty, twentieth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed under Toktoghan 脫脫|脱脱[Tuo1 tuo1] in 1345 during the Yuan Dynasty 元[Yuan2], 496 scrolls/(not to be confused with 宋書|宋书[Song4 shu1])
surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
surname Shi

sentences.english: His contributions are outstanding for resumed publication and development of Journal.
sentences.chinese: 他既是優秀編輯，又是宋史研究的學者。

sentences.english: He is not only an excellent editor, but also a scholar of Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 他既是優秀編輯，又是宋史研究的學者。

sentences.english: Song dynasty history records of this event, it the truth of what?
sentences.chinese: 《宋史》中記載的這一事情，它的真相終究是什麼呢？

sentences.english: The Chronicles Of course, Ming and Qing Dynasties is an important historical Sung.
sentences.chinese: 明清的方誌當然又是宋史的重要史料。

sentences.english: Prof. Chen Lesu is one of the earliest scholars who started the study.
sentences.chinese: 陳樂素教授便是最早從事宋史研究的老一輩學者之一。

definition: History of the Jurchen Jin Dynasty, twenty second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed under Toktoghan 脫脫|脱脱[Tuo1 tuo1] in 1345 during the Yuan Dynasty 元[Yuan2], 135 scrolls

A Mirror for the Wise Ruler (or Comprehensive Mirror for Aid in Government), a vast chronological general history, written by 司馬光|司马光[Si1 ma3 Guang1] Sima Guang (1019-1089) and collaborators during the Northern Song in 1084, covering the period 403 BC-959 AD, 294 scrolls
